channel.title: Webclient error
channel.description:
when i open my client.. a couple seconds later.. it closes.. and this is what it sais in my console..
[code]java.lang.ThreadDeath at java.lang.Thread.stop(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ThreadGroup.stopOrSuspend(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ThreadGroup.stop(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.AppContext.dispose(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.release(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.security.PluginClassLoader.release(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.release(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.sendEvent(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.onPrivateClose(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer$3.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: ka.C(-120) loginapplet.A(2) ha.O(105) | ka:136 loginapplet:1012 ha:324 ha:162 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.NullPointerException[/code]
Any help?

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
